title: Why This Ebola Outbreak Is Different Than Earlier Versions
teaser: In 1976, Dr. David Heymann of the London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine helped curb the first Ebola outbreak in what was then Zaire. He speaks with NPR's Linda Wertheimer.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
